\nSub UpdateCells()\n Dim ws As Works:
```python
import uno
from loguru import logger

def UpdateCells(*args):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()

    ws = None
    ws = sheet
    sheet.getCellRangeByName("A1").setString("Hello")
    sheet.getCellRangeByName("B1").setValue(42)
    sheet.getCellByPosition(0, 1).setString("World")
    logger.info("Updated cells!")
```
\nPrivate Sub Workbook_Open()\n MsgBo:
```python
import uno
from loguru import logger
from datetime import datetime

def Workbook_Open(*args):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()

    logger.info("Welcome to the workbook!")
    sheet.getCellRangeByName("A1").setString("Opened at: " + str(datetime.now()))
    doc.calculateAll()
```
\nSub FillRange()\n Dim i As Integer\:
```python
import uno
from loguru import logger

def FillRange(*args):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()

    i = None
    for i in range(1, 10 + 1):
        sheet.getCellByPosition(0, i-1).setValue(i * i)
        sheet.getCellByPosition(1, i-1).setFormula("=A" + str(i) + "*2")
    # end for
    logger.info("Range filled!")
```
\nSub ProcessStrings()\n Dim fullName:
```python
import uno
from loguru import logger
import math

def ProcessStrings(*args):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()

    fullName = None
    firstName = None
    lastName = None

    fullName = "John Doe"
    firstName = fullName[:4]
    lastName = fullName[-3:]

    sheet.getCellRangeByName("A1").setString(firstName.upper())
    sheet.getCellRangeByName("B1").setString(lastName.lower())
    sheet.getCellRangeByName("C1").setValue(len(fullName))
```
Attribute VB_Name = \"DieseArbeitsmappe\:
```python
import uno
from loguru import logger
import math
from datetime import datetime

# Global variable to store MoveAfterReturnDirection setting
MARD = None

def Workbook_BeforeClose(Cancel=False):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()
    
    # Restore user-specific setting "Direction of selection movement after pressing Enter"
    global MARD
    try:
        controller = doc.getCurrentController()
        if MARD is not None:
            controller.MoveAfterReturn = MARD
    except:
        pass

def Workbook_Open(*args):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()
    
    # Save user-specific setting "Direction of selection movement after pressing Enter"
    global MARD
    controller = doc.getCurrentController()
    MARD = controller.MoveAfterReturn
    # Set to move down (1 = DOWN in LibreOffice Calc)
    controller.MoveAfterReturn = 1

g_exportedScripts = (Workbook_Open, Workbook_BeforeClose)
```

Attribute VB_Name = \"Tabelle2\"\r\nAttr:
```python
import uno
from loguru import logger
import math
from datetime import datetime
from com.sun.star.sheet import XSheetCellRangeContainer
from com.sun.star.util import XModifyListener

# Get UNO context
ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()


def Worksheet_Change(Target):
    '''Auto-translated VBA event procedure.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()
    
    # Get row and column from Target (0-based in UNO)
    target_row = Target.getCellAddress().Row
    target_col = Target.getCellAddress().Column
    
    if target_row > 0 and target_row < 19:  # Row > 1 And Row < 20 (0-based: 1-18)
        if target_col > 1 and target_col < 19:  # Column > 2 And Column < 20 (0-based: 2-18)
            # nur Änderungen in den Zellen C2 bis S19 prüfen
            xTeamNo1 = target_row  # target_row is already 0-based, but VBA uses Row-1, so we use target_row directly for 1-based equivalent
            if Target.getType().value == "VALUE":
                xTeamNo2 = Target.getValue()
            else:
                xTeamNo2 = Target.getString()
            sheet.getCellRangeByName("T25").setValue(xTeamNo1)
            sheet.getCellRangeByName("U25").setValue(xTeamNo2) if isinstance(xTeamNo2, (int, float)) else sheet.getCellRangeByName("U25").setString(str(xTeamNo2))


def Worksheet_SelectionChange(Target):
    '''Auto-translated VBA event procedure.'''
    # Markieren der aktuellen Zeile/Spalte
    # return  # Exit Sub
    
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()
    
    # Get row and column from Target (0-based in UNO)
    target_row = Target.getCellAddress().Row
    target_col = Target.getCellAddress().Column
    
    if target_row > 0 and target_row < 19:  # Row > 1 And Row < 19 (0-based: 1-18)
        # Reset
        # ActiveSheet.Unprotect
        sheet.unprotect("")
        
        # Range("A2:A19").Interior.Color = RGB(138, 187, 213)
        range_a2_a19 = sheet.getCellRangeByName("A2:A19")
        range_a2_a19.CellBackColor = (138 + 187 * 256 + 213 * 256 * 256)
        
        # Range("A1:S1").Interior.Color = RGB(138, 187, 213)
        range_a1_s1 = sheet.getCellRangeByName("A1:S1")
        range_a1_s1.CellBackColor = (138 + 187 * 256 + 213 * 256 * 256)
        
        if target_col > 1 and target_col < 19:  # Column > 2 And Column < 19 (0-based: 2-18)
            # xRange = "A" & Target.Row (VBA Row is 1-based, so we add 1 to target_row)
            xRange = "A" + str(target_row + 1)
            sheet.getCellRangeByName(xRange).CellBackColor = (216 + 233 * 256 + 241 * 256 * 256)
            
            # xRange = Chr(Target.Column + 64) & "1" (VBA Column is 1-based, so we add 1 to target_col)
            xRange = chr(target_col + 1 + 64) + "1"
            sheet.getCellRangeByName(xRange).CellBackColor = (216 + 233 * 256 + 241 * 256 * 256)
        
        # ActiveSheet.Protect
        sheet.protect("")


def FarbeAuslesenTest(*args):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.'''
    # Liest die RGB-Farben in der aktiven Zelle aus (zum Testen)
    
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    active_cell = doc.getCurrentController().getSelection()
    
    # If ActiveCell.Interior.ColorIndex = -4142 Then Exit Sub
    # In UNO, -4142 typically means no color/automatic
    if not hasattr(active_cell, 'CellBackColor') or active_cell.CellBackColor == -1:
        return
    
    xColorZahl = active_cell.CellBackColor  # RGB verschlüsselt (R*256*256 + G*256 + B)
    xColorBlue = int(xColorZahl / 256 / 256)
    xColorGreen = int((xColorZahl - (xColorBlue * 256 * 256)) / 256)
    xColorRed = xColorZahl - (xColorBlue * 256 * 256) - (xColorGreen * 256)
    logger.info("Farben RGB: " + str(xColorRed) + "-" + str(xColorGreen) + "-" + str(xColorBlue))
```

import uno
from loguru import logger
import math
from datetime import datetime

def worksheet_selection_change(event=None):
    '''Auto-translated VBA event handler for Worksheet_SelectionChange.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()
    
    # Get active cell position
    selection = doc.getCurrentController().getSelection()
    if selection:
        cursor = selection.getCellAddress()
        r = cursor.Row + 1  # Convert to 1-based indexing
        c = cursor.Column + 1  # Convert to 1-based indexing
        
        # Call ErgebnisFormat function
        ErgebnisFormat(r, c)

    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()
    
    # Get active cell position
    active_cell = doc.getCurrentController().getSelection()
    cursor = sheet.createCursorByRange(active_cell)
    r = cursor.getRangeAddress().StartRow + 1  # Convert to 1-based
    c = cursor.getRangeAddress().StartColumn + 1  # Convert to 1-based
    
    ErgebnisFormat(r, c)

import uno
from loguru import logger
import math
from datetime import datetime
from com.sun.star.awt.MessageBoxButtons import BUTTONS_OK, BUTTONS_OK_CANCEL
from com.sun.star.awt.MessageBoxType import MESSAGEBOX, ERRORBOX, WARNINGBOX

def Mail_NurText_kopieren(*args):

    Kopieren für Nur-Text-Mail'''

    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)

    sheet.getCellRangeByName("B26:A47")  # Selection not needed in Python-UNO batch operations
    # Copy operation would need clipboard handling in UNO
    # Selection not needed in Python-UNO batch operations

def DateiOeffnen(*args):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()

    # Dateiauswahl anzeigen
    fileToOpen = None
    # File picker dialog in UNO
    file_picker = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.ui.dialogs.FilePicker", ctx)
    file_picker.appendFilter("Excel (*.xls)", "*.xls")
    if file_picker.execute():
        fileToOpen = file_picker.getFiles()[0]
        if fileToOpen != False:
            for x in range(len(fileToOpen), 0, -1):
                if fileToOpen[x-1:x] == "/":
                    break
            folderToOpen = fileToOpen[:x]
            doc.getSheets().getByName("Import").getCellRangeByName("B9").setString(folderToOpen)

def Import(*args):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.
    importiert die Tipps aus einer anderen Datei'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()

    # Message box with OK/Cancel
    toolkit = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.awt.Toolkit", ctx)
    parent = doc.getCurrentController().getFrame().getContainerWindow()
    msgbox = toolkit.createMessageBox(parent, WARNINGBOX, BUTTONS_OK_CANCEL, "Import von Tipps aus anderer Excel-Datei",
        "Sie starten nun den Import aus einer anderen Datei. Die Import-Funktion wurde ausgiebig getestet. Trotzdem handelt es sich um einen komplexen Vorgang, weshalb erst nach vielen Monaten Echtbetrieb auf vielen verschiedenen PCs eine endgültige Sicherheit über die 100%ige Funktionsweise besteht. Sie sollten daher vor jedem neuen Spieltag eine Sicherungskopie Ihrer Tipp-Datei machen, wenn Sie die Import-Funktion nutzen.\n\nDie Datei, aus der kopiert wird, muss den zu kopierenden Spieler in den gleichen Zellen haben und der Dateiname muss wie der Kurzname des Spielers lauten! Auch dürfen prinzipiell keine Veränderungen an der Strukur der Datei (Zeilen/Spalten) vorgenommen werden.\n\nDer Kopiervorgang dauert zwischen wenigen Sekunden und einigen Minuten - je nach Geschwindigkeit Ihres Systems und Anzahl der Spieler und Spieltage...")
    mbr = msgbox.execute()
    if mbr != 1:
        return
    
    try:
        # ----------------------------------------------------------------
        # Sheet-Namen einlesen
        actualVersion = doc.getTitle()
        formerVersionPfad = doc.getSheets().getByName("Import").getCellRangeByName("B14").getString()
        
        if actualVersion == doc.getSheets().getByName("Import").getCellRangeByName("E31").getString():
            # nicht in sich selbst importieren
            msgbox_err = toolkit.createMessageBox(parent, ERRORBOX, BUTTONS_OK, "Quelle = Ziel",
                "Quell- und Zieldatei sind identisch. Der Import wird abgebrochen!")
            msgbox_err.execute()
            return
        
        for x in range(len(formerVersionPfad), 0, -1):
            if formerVersionPfad[x-1:x] == "/":
                break
        formerVersion = formerVersionPfad[x:]
        anzImp = 1
        if doc.getSheets().getByName("Import").getCellRangeByName("B21").getValue() == 1:
            anzImp = int(doc.getSheets().getByName("Import").getCellRangeByName("B22").getValue())
        s1 = int(doc.getSheets().getByName("Import").getCellRangeByName("D21").getValue())
        s2 = int(doc.getSheets().getByName("Import").getCellRangeByName("D22").getValue())
        
        fnf = 0
        
        for x in range(1, anzImp + 1):  # Spieler
            
            if anzImp > 1:
                SpielerNr = x
                formerVersion = doc.getSheets().getByName("Import").getCellByPosition(5, x + 30 - 1).getString()
                formerVersionPfad = doc.getSheets().getByName("Import").getCellRangeByName("B9").getString() + formerVersion
            else:
                SpielerNr = int(doc.getSheets().getByName("Import").getCellRangeByName("B21").getValue()) - 1
            
            if actualVersion != formerVersion:
                # Wenn alle Spieler die anderen Dateien gegenseitig kopieren, wird hier jeweils
                # die eigene Datei übersprungen (nicht in sich selbst importiert)
                
                try:
                    # zu kopierende Datei öffnen
                    formerDoc = desktop.loadComponentFromURL("file://" + formerVersionPfad, "_blank", 0, ())
                except:
                    if anzImp == 1:
                        msgbox_err = toolkit.createMessageBox(parent, ERRORBOX, BUTTONS_OK, "Datei nicht gefunden",
                            f"Die Datei {formerVersionPfad} wurde nicht gefunden.\n\nEs wurde nichts importiert!")
                        msgbox_err.execute()
                        return
                    fnf = fnf + 1
                    formerVersion = ""
                    continue
                
                if formerVersion != "":
                    for y in range(s1, s2 + 1):  # Spieltage
                        
                        # Übernahme des Spieltags und des Spielers
                        Spieltag = y
                        SpielerSpalteNr = (SpielerNr * 2) + 3
                        if Spieltag < 11:
                            # bis Spieltag 10 SheetName im Format x-yy
                            if Spieltag % 2 == 0:
                                SheetName = str(Spieltag - 1) + "-" + str(Spieltag)
                                SpieltagZeileAb = 16
                            else:
                                SheetName = str(Spieltag) + "-" + str(Spieltag + 1)
                                SpieltagZeileAb = 3
                        else:
                            # ab Spieltag 11 SheetName im Format xxyy
                            if Spieltag % 2 == 0:
                                SheetName = str(Spieltag - 1) + str(Spieltag)
                                SpieltagZeileAb = 16
                            else:
                                SheetName = str(Spieltag) + str(Spieltag + 1)
                                SpieltagZeileAb = 3
                        
                        # ----------------------------------------------------------------
                        # Kopiervorgang
                        try:
                            formerSheet = formerDoc.getSheets().getByName(SheetName)
                        except:
                            msgbox_err = toolkit.createMessageBox(parent, ERRORBOX, BUTTONS_OK, "Datei nicht gefunden",
                                f"Die Datei {formerVersion} hat kein Tabellenblatt mit dem Namen '{SheetName}'.\n\nEs wurde nichts importiert!")
                            msgbox_err.execute()
                            return
                        
                        # keine Daten gefunden - Meldung, dann weiter
                        if formerSheet.getCellByPosition(SpielerSpalteNr - 1, SpieltagZeileAb - 1).getString() == "":
                            logger.info(f"Keine Daten zum {str(Spieltag)}. Spieltag gefunden in Datei {formerVersion}")
                        
                        # Copy data from source to target
                        sourceRange = formerSheet.getCellRangeByPosition(SpielerSpalteNr - 1, SpieltagZeileAb - 1, 
                                                                         SpielerSpalteNr - 1, SpieltagZeileAb + 8 - 1)
                        targetSheet = doc.getSheets().getByName(SheetName)
                        targetRange = targetSheet.getCellRangeByPosition(SpielerSpalteNr - 1, SpieltagZeileAb - 1,
                                                                         SpielerSpalteNr - 1, SpieltagZeileAb + 8 - 1)
                        
                        # Copy values only
                        sourceData = sourceRange.getDataArray()
                        targetRange.setDataArray(sourceData)
                    
                    # Close former document
                    formerDoc.close(True)
        
        if fnf > 0:
            msgbox_err = toolkit.createMessageBox(parent, ERRORBOX, BUTTONS_OK, "Datei(en) nicht gefunden",
                f"{str(fnf)} Dateien wurden nicht gefunden. Prüfen Sie ggf. den Pfad")
            msgbox_err.execute()
        
        # Selection not needed in Python-UNO batch operations
        
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Error: {str(e)}")

def ErgebnisFormat(r, c, *args):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()

    # c = Target.Column
    # r = Target.Row
    if r < 4 or (r > 12 and r < 17) or r > 25:
        return
    if c == 4 or (c > 4 and ((c - 1) % 2 == 0)):
        # ---------------------------------------------------------------
        v = sheet.getCellByPosition(c - 1, r - 1 - 1).getString()
        # zweistellige Zahlen in Ergebnisse umwandeln
        if len(v) == 2:
            sheet.getCellByPosition(c - 1, r - 1 - 1).setString(v[:1] + ":" + v[-1:])
        # ---------------------------------------------------------------
        # falsche Formate korrigieren
        erg = sheet.getCellByPosition(c - 1, r - 1 - 1).getString()
        erg = erg.replace("-", ":")
        erg = erg.replace("_", ":")
        erg = erg.replace(".", ":")
        erg = erg.replace(",", ":")
        erg = erg.replace(";", ":")
        erg = erg.replace("/", ":")
        while erg.find("::") > -1:
            # alle mehrfachen Doppelpunkte entfernen
            erg = erg.replace("::", ":")
        sheet.getCellByPosition(c - 1, r - 1 - 1).setString(erg)
        # ---------------------------------------------------------------
        if len(erg) == 1 or erg[-1:] == ":" or erg[:1] == ":":
            # Falsches Tipp-Format. Tipp wird gelöscht.
            sheet.getCellByPosition(c - 1, r - 1 - 1).setString("")

import uno
from loguru import logger
import math
from datetime import datetime

# This VBA code contains only attribute declarations for a worksheet class module.
# These attributes define metadata about the worksheet object in VBA but do not
# contain executable code or procedures.
# 
# In LibreOffice Calc with Python-UNO, worksheet properties are handled differently:
# - Worksheets are accessed through the document's sheet collection
# - No equivalent class module structure exists
# - Sheet-specific code would be implemented as standalone functions
#
# Translation: No executable code to translate.
# If this worksheet contained event handlers or methods, they would be translated
# as separate Python functions that accept the sheet as a parameter.

# Example of how to reference this sheet in Python-UNO:
# ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
# smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
# desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)

Attribute VB_Name = \"Tabelle22\"\r\nAtt:
```python
import uno
from loguru import logger
import math
from datetime import datetime
from com.sun.star.sheet import XModifyListener
from com.sun.star.lang import XEventListener

class WorksheetChangeListener(uno.Base, XModifyListener):
    '''Listener for worksheet change events.'''
    
    def __init__(self, doc):
        self.doc = doc
    
    def modified(self, event):
        '''Handle cell modification events.'''
        try:
            # Get UNO context
            ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
            smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
            desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
            doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
            
            # Get the current selection
            selection = doc.getCurrentSelection()
            
            if selection and hasattr(selection, 'getCellAddress'):
                # Get cell address
                address = selection.getCellAddress()
                c = address.Column + 1  # Convert to 1-based
                r = address.Row + 1     # Convert to 1-based
                
                if c == 3 and r == 30:
                    # Get cell value
                    cell_value = selection.getValue() if selection.getType().value == "VALUE" else 0
                    
                    if cell_value > 3 or cell_value < 2:
                        # Show message
                        msgbox = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.awt.Toolkit", ctx)
                        box = msgbox.createMessageBox(
                            doc.getCurrentController().getFrame().getContainerWindow(),
                            uno.Enum("com.sun.star.awt.MessageBoxType", "ERRORBOX"),
                            1,  # OK button
                            "Anzahl Absteiger",
                            "Hier dürfen nur Werte zwischen 2 und 3 eingegeben werden!"
                        )
                        box.execute()
                        
                        # Reset value to 3
                        selection.setValue(3)
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"Error in worksheet change handler: {str(e)}")
    
    def disposing(self, event):
        '''Handle disposal event.'''
        pass

def Worksheet_Change(Target):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure for worksheet change event.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()
    
    # Get target cell position
    address = Target.getCellAddress()
    c = address.Column + 1  # Convert to 1-based
    r = address.Row + 1     # Convert to 1-based
    
    if c == 3 and r == 30:
        # Get cell value
        target_value = Target.getValue() if Target.getType().value == "VALUE" else 0
        
        if target_value > 3 or target_value < 2:
            # Show message box
            msgbox = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.awt.Toolkit", ctx)
            parent_win = doc.getCurrentController().getFrame().getContainerWindow()
            box = msgbox.createMessageBox(
                parent_win,
                uno.Enum("com.sun.star.awt.MessageBoxType", "ERRORBOX"),
                1,  # OK button
                "Anzahl Absteiger",
                "Hier dürfen nur Werte zwischen 2 und 3 eingegeben werden!"
            )
            box.execute()
            
            # Reset value to 3
            Target.setValue(3)

# To register the listener, call this function
def register_worksheet_change_listener(*args):
    '''Register the worksheet change listener.'''
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else None
    
    if doc:
        listener = WorksheetChangeListener(doc)
        doc.addModifyListener(listener)
        logger.info("Worksheet change listener registered")
```

import uno
from loguru import logger
import math
from datetime import datetime

def Dropdown9_BeiÄnderung(*args):
    '''Auto-translated VBA procedure.'''
    # Get UNO context
    ctx = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getComponentContext() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else uno.getComponentContext()
    smgr = ctx.ServiceManager
    desktop = smgr.createInstanceWithContext("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop", ctx)
    doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() if 'XSCRIPTCONTEXT' in dir() else desktop.getCurrentComponent()
    sheet = doc.getCurrentController().getActiveSheet()

    cell_d22 = sheet.getCellRangeByName("D22")
    cell_d21 = sheet.getCellRangeByName("D21")
    
    value_d22 = cell_d22.getValue() if cell_d22.getType().value == "VALUE" else cell_d22.getString()
    value_d21 = cell_d21.getValue() if cell_d21.getType().value == "VALUE" else cell_d21.getString()
    
    if value_d22 < value_d21:
        cell_d21.setValue(value_d22)
